mapper.sql: id, permission_group_id, user_name, login_name, login_pwd, claim_order, goods_order, device_list, device_type, device_status, pasture_list, sheep_breeds_list, is_super_admin, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: SELECT auser.id, auser.user_name, auser.is_super_admin, pgroup.group_name, auser.permission_group_id FROM admin_user auser LEFT JOIN permission_group pgroup ON auser.permission_group_id= pgroup.id ORDER BY auser.id limit #{offset},#{limit}

select auser.id, auser.permission_group_id, pgroup.group_name, auser.user_name, auser.login_name, auser.claim_order, auser.goods_order, auser.device_list, auser.device_type, auser.device_status, auser.pasture_list, auser.sheep_breeds_list, auser.is_super_admin, auser.create_time, auser.modify_time from admin_user auser LEFT JOIN permission_group pgroup ON auser.permission_group_id= pgroup.id where auser.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into admin_user (id, permission_group_id, user_name, login_name, login_pwd, claim_order, goods_order, device_list, device_type, device_status, pasture_list, sheep_breeds_list, is_super_admin, create_time, modify_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permissionGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pastureList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sheepBreedsList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSuperAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update admin_user
permission_group_id = #{permissionGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_pwd = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
claim_order = #{claimOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_order = #{goodsOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_list = #{deviceList,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_status = #{deviceStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pasture_list = #{pastureList,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sheep_breeds_list = #{sheepBreedsList,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_super_admin = #{isSuperAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update admin_user set permission_group_id = #{permissionGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_pwd = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, claim_order = #{claimOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_order = #{goodsOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_list = #{deviceList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_status = #{deviceStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pasture_list = #{pastureList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sheep_breeds_list = #{sheepBreedsList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_super_admin = #{isSuperAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
